tweets.text: Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Reported this pollution on river Ure Yorkshire said they would look into it over 2 hours later get a call saying where is it and they would get someone to look later that day the smell was giving me headache it was so bad. Not heard a thing since https://t.co/5N1mU4paFv
@bdebonis @Feargal_Sharkey @ThoroughbredAli @EnvAgency It's been happening for years, Brexit or not!

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Have I got this right? 
48 hours ago the @EnvAgency say better regulation is needed to protect the environment, and 24 hrs later they say they will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents of and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/0IefMSag90

The @EnvAgency head says that the climate emergency is hitting ‚Äúworst case scenario‚Äù levels.

5.2 million homes and businesses in England are already at risk of flooding.

Government must urgently reduce emissions and up its game on climate adaptation here and internationally.

urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
We've been planting trees around the Memorial Gardens in #York, to replace four trees we took out in 2019 to create space to build flood defences. For every tree we remove on the #YorkFAS we are planting five new trees. 
https://t.co/fjLkV5dh5t https://t.co/1QCwiAgj9B

Right @EnvAgencyAnglia @EmmaHowardBoyd This is unacceptable and needs to be sorted out. 100s of acres of crops flooded this winter and a grain store full of wheat went under on our farm. What are you doing about this @NFUEastAnglia @thurrockcouncil @BBCEssex https://t.co/F3eihf9Xf8

In the last 24 hours #Cumbria has seen 65% of it's rainfall for the month

Our teams continue to be out in Cumbria clearing grids to #ReduceFloodRisk 

Have you signed up for flood warnings in your area? Keep up to date with the latest & sign up here ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/ZPNKETcukX https://t.co/h6ZaPIzOTu
